abstract: Aware that consumers often say they want healthy snacks but choose fatty ones, Pringles said it did extensive sampling on its new product.
snippet: Aware that consumers often say they want healthy snacks but choose fatty ones, Pringles said it did extensive sampling on its new product.
lead_paragraph: IS there any such thing as a healthy-sounding snack that also tastes good? Procter & Gamble is betting that the answer is yes by introducing a multigrain version of its popular snack-in-a-canister, Pringles.

headline.main: The Chip That Stacks Adds a Multigrain Twist
headline.print_headline: The Chip That Stacks Adds a Multigrain Twist
